channel.title: ESS 469/569 on Machine Learning for the Geosciences
channel.description: Recent content in ESS 469/569 on Machine Learning for the Geosciences

item.title: 01 | Student introductions
item.description:
Objective

In order to develop collaborations and, ultimately, assemble groups for the final project, it is important to know something about your fellow students.

For this assignment, you will assemble up to two slides that tell us:

  1. Your name.
  2. Your department.
  3. An aspect of the geosciences that especially interests you.
  4. Your long-term goals.
  5. Experiences you may have with AI/ML.

You will have exactly one minute to present your slides to the class. I will strictly enforce this time limit.

Description

Given the geosciences’ central focus on \ul{evaluating Earth data}, artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) is likely become ubiquitous across all sub-disciplines of the field. Therefore, it is important for geoscientists (of all stripes!) to figure out how to:
